def calculate_team_strength_sum(n, k, strengths, M=1000000008):

    def modpow(a, x, p):
        res = 1
        while x > 0:
            if x % 2 == 1:
                res *= a
                res %= p
            a = a * a
            a %= p
            x = x // 2
        return res

    def modInverse(a, p):
        return modpow(a, p - 2, p)

    def comp(n, r, fact, ifact, M):
        ret = fact[n] * ifact[r] % M
        ret *= ifact[n - r]
        ret %= M
        return ret

    def precompute(fact, ifact, N, M):
        fact[0] = 1
        for i in range(1, N):
            fact[i] = i * fact[i - 1] % M
        ifact[N - 1] = modpow(fact[N - 1], M - 2, M)
        j = N - 2
        while j >= 0:
            ifact[j] = (j + 1) * ifact[j + 1] % M
            j -= 1
    N = 100005
    fact = [0] * N
    ifact = [0] * N
    precompute(fact, ifact, N, M)
    strengths.sort()
    res = 0
    for i in range(n - k + 1):
        ncr = comp(n - i - 1, k - 1, fact, ifact, M)
        ncr = ncr * strengths[i] % M
        res = (res + ncr) % M
    return res

        ret = fact[n] * ifact[r] % M
        ret *= ifact[n - r]
        ret %= M
        return ret
